text: hello its Chef John from food wishes
calm and welcome to another installment
of follow the sourdough today's day two
and this is called feeding the starter
because what we're going to do is feed
the starter so what you can do is you're
going to take your mixture from
yesterday and you're going to mix it
again I told you to mix it a couple
times in the 24-hour period that was
sitting out at room temperature and you
probably notice there was like a little
thin watery layer on top
so hopefully you stirred that in a
couple times it doesn't really matter
but stirring it kind of aerates it and
gets more that wild yeast in the mixture
so what we're going to do here after 24
hours we're going to stir it up we're
going to remove half and we're going to
add some more flour and water okay so
I'm just going to use a ladle here I'm
not going to measure it you can measure
it if you want but I'm just going to eye
it I'm going to take out half and I'm
just going to discard that so you just
throw that away so I'm going to add
another half cup of water and I'm going
to add a half cup of the unbleached
bread flour so you're going to mix in a
1/2 cup of flour half cup of water whisk
it in very well so there's no lumps and
then we're going to cover it back up and
leave it out of room temperature again
and we're going to stir that another
couple times during the next 24-hour
period and you're going to repeat that
every day until I tell you to stop okay
so 24 hours from now I want you to do
that exact same thing and stay tuned for
the next episode all right check the
site if you're not already there for
more info enjoy
you
